name: generator-ng6
description: angualr component devlopment pack with browserify,es6,bootstrap

scripts.start: watchify  src/app/app.js -o dist/app.min.js  -t babelify  -t stringify -t browserify-css --debug -v
scripts.build:browsfy: browserify src/app/app.js -x angular -x @uirouter/angularjs   -t babelify -t browserify-css -t stringify -t stripify -t  browserify-ngmin
scripts.build:bundle: browserify src/*.js -t babelify -t browserify-css -t stringify -t stripify -t  browserify-ngmin -p [ factor-bundle -o 'uglifyjs | gzip > dist/`basename $FILE`.gz' ] | uglifyjs | gzip  > dist/common.js.gz
scripts.build1: npm run build:index && npm run build:browsfy
scripts.build.watch: watchify  src/app/app.js -o dist/app.min.js  -t babelify  -t stringify -t browserify-css --debug -v

author: Aravind Buddha
